content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Additional Resources module you may find some useful links to Sitecore Documentation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://doc.sitecore.com/users/101/sitecore-experience-platform/en/content-authoring.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Content Authoring\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" documentation provides information on how to create and manage content in the Sitecore Experience Platform. Via this documentation you may learn how to use the Content Editor, Experience Editor, and Media Library to create, edit, manage, and publish content.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-spacerun\":\"yes\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://doc.sitecore.com/legacy-docs/SC72/content-authors-cookbook-sc72-a4.pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Content Author's Reference and Cookbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - a Conceptual Overview and Practical Guide to Using Sitecore.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
